_sText:
A small fun map where each team starts out in their room.
Guns are not really used here, but pressing buttons and creating a pillar to be dropped on your enemy's base is.

User presses a button on his base, causes pillar to drop in specific place determined by button, pillar being dropped smashes anything in its way.

Be careful, and be fast!
Remember, what you do to their team they can do to you! 

Small map recommend maximum of 12 people. 6 on each team.


Watch your head,
Disturbed.
